rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a reception area that leads to the living areas. The lobby is designed keeping Vastu in mind, ensuring positive energy flow and a welcoming environment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large living area designed for family gatherings with high ceilings and concrete finishes in line with Brutalist style. The room has a central open space that allows ample natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room is the dining area with an integrated kitchen space that allows for easy interaction. The space adheres to local building norms and Vastu principles, ensuring functional design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern, efficient space with a minimalist approach that complements the Brutalist design. The layout is optimized for workflow and adheres to safety standards.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A guest bathroom designed with practicality in mind and ample storage. The space is aligned for optimal energy flow per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Study/Utility Room
rooms.description: A flexible room that can be used as a study or utility space. The room is strategically located to balance the home's energy according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Includes storage and a small utility space for household operations. Designed to be functional while adhering to local building norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A robust door entry designed to welcome guests while ensuring security and adhering to Vastu principles.
openings.location: North-facing entrance to maximize auspicious energy flow.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors
openings.description: Access points to the spacious balconies that are attached to each bedroom on the upper floor. The openings follow local building norms and incorporate Vastu guidelines.
openings.location: East of respective bedrooms (for optimal sunrise view, despite west-facing plot adjustments).

openings.name: Emergency Exit
openings.description: A safety exit designed in compliance with local regulations for the ground floor level.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed with a large balcony that overlooks a landscaped area. The room is oriented to maximize privacy and adhere to Vastu principles, ensuring balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A second master bedroom featuring an expansive balcony for relaxation and natural light. The design considers joint family needs with ample storage space.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: An extra bedroom for joint family members. The design is optimized for both personal space and functionality, with a modest balcony.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: A shared bathroom that efficiently caters to family needs while ensuring privacy and ease of maintenance. The design considers Vastu for water flow and energy balance.

rooms.name: Balcony Area
rooms.description: Spacious balconies attached to each bedroom that provide natural light and a serene view, designed in accordance with both Brutalist aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Doorways
openings.description: Door openings leading to each bedroom's balcony. These are designed with reinforced materials and Vastu alignment for optimal energy flow.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: A well-defined staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor, built in a Brutalist style with safety features in compliance with local norms.
